title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Healthy Eating Habits Exploration Project: Nutritional Analysis Through Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can mathematically compare nutritional components of various foods and design balanced meal plans
Students can create personalized nutrition plans using health status simulation data
Learners can quantitatively report the effects of dietary changes over eight weeks using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
